SEARCH

Class ParentalControls

java.lang.Object
ParentalControls
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ParentalControls extends Object implements Serializable
The ParentalControls class provides functionality for managing parental restrictions in the game. It includes password authentication, configurable play hours, session tracking, and pet revival capabilities. Parents can enable or disable restrictions and set allowed play time windows to manage how long and when the game can be played. It also tracks the total play time and the number of sessions for averaging purposes. Author: Adrian
See Also:

      public ParentalControls(String password)
      Constructs a new ParentalControls instance with a given password.

  • Method Details

    • authenticate

      public boolean authenticate(String attempt)
      Authenticates an attempted password entry.
      Parameters:
      attempt - the password entered by the user
      Returns:
      true if the password matches, false otherwise

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(String newPassword)
      Sets a new password for parental controls.
      Parameters:
      newPassword - the new password to set

    • setRestrictionsEnabled

      public void setRestrictionsEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables play restrictions.
      Parameters:
      enabled - true to enable restrictions, false to disable

    • setAllowedPlayHours

      public void setAllowedPlayHours(int startHour, int endHour)
      Sets the allowed hours for gameplay. Start hour must be between 0–23, end hour between 1–24.
      Parameters:
      startHour - the start of allowed playtime (inclusive)
      endHour - the end of allowed playtime (exclusive)

    • canPlayNow

      public boolean canPlayNow()
      Checks whether gameplay is allowed at the current system time.
      Returns:
      true if within allowed hours or if restrictions are disabled

    • setMaxAllowedMinutes

      public void setMaxAllowedMinutes(float minutes)

    • getMaxAllowedMinutes

      public float getMaxAllowedMinutes()

    • addPlayTime

      public void addPlayTime(float minutesPlayed)
      Adds playtime (in minutes) to the total tracked time.
      Parameters:
      minutesPlayed - the number of minutes played in the session

    • incrementSessionCount

      public void incrementSessionCount()
      Increments the session count (each time a session occurs).

    • getTotalPlayTime

      public float getTotalPlayTime()
      Gets the total playtime in minutes.
      Returns:
      the total time played

    • getAveragePlayTime

      public float getAveragePlayTime()
      Calculates the average playtime per session.
      Returns:
      the average playtime, or 0 if no sessions have occurred

    • resetPlayTimeStats

      public void resetPlayTimeStats()
      Resets playtime and session statistics to zero.

    • revivePet

      public void revivePet(Pet pet)
      Revives the specified pet by restoring all stats and setting its state to NORMAL.
      Parameters:
      pet - the pet to revive

    • isRestrictionsEnabled

      public boolean isRestrictionsEnabled()
      Checks if restrictions are currently enabled.
      Returns:
      true if enabled, false otherwise

    • getRestrictions

      public String getRestrictions()
      Returns a string describing the current restriction settings.
      Returns:
      a string description of active play hour limits, or "No restrictions" if disabled
